title: 【颱風追擊】2001號熱帶氣旋 黃蜂 VONGFONG（01W）

replies.msg:
颱風追擊：熱帶氣旋 黃蜂

2001號熱帶氣旋 黃蜂 VONGFONG（01W）
來源：中国澳門
意義：黃蜂是一種長有翅膀及黃黑色橫間的昆蟲。由於被它的螫針刺中會令人疼痛，所以人們都像恐懼颱風侵襲一樣害怕它

【註】 發出颱風追擊帖，表示有熱帶氣旋在南海或西北太平洋一帶形成。　
為使大家有一個良好舒適的瀏覽環境，請不要張貼未經證實的風暴消息、使用簡體中文貼文、提及力場或洗版，謝謝合作。　
請勿直接張貼會自動更新的氣象圖片，請把圖片上傳至儲存空間後再轉貼在帖文上。謝謝。　

請關注氣象巴打•高登氣象台最新動態



﹏﹏﹏﹏﹏﹏﹏﹏﹏﹏﹏
◤熱帶氣旋路徑圖



▲香港天文台(HKO)


▲ 日本氣象廳 (JMA)

▲ 聯合颱風警報中心 (JTWC)

▲各機構綜合預測

◤颱風追擊必備資訊

◆ 香港天文台 (HKO)：http://www.hko.gov.hk/informtc/tcSmap_uc.htm
◆ 日本氣象廳 (JMA)：http://www.jma.go.jp/jp/typh
◆ 中央氣象台 (CMA)：http://www.nmc.gov.cn/publish/typhoon
◆ 中央氣象局 (CWB)：http://www.cwb.gov.tw/V7/prevent/typhoon/ty.htm
◆ 韓國氣象廳 (KMA)：http://web.kma.go.kr/chn/weather/typoon/typhoon.jsp
◆ 聯合颱風警報中心 (JTWC)：http://www.usno.navy.mil/JTWC
◆ 美國海軍實驗中心 (NRL)：http://www.nrlmry.navy.mil/TC.html

◇ 認識熱帶氣旋：http://j.mp/tc_edu
◇ 熱帶氣旋實時資料：http://j.mp/tc_realtime
◇ ECMWF數值預報：http://x.co/ECMWF
﹏﹏﹏﹏﹏﹏﹏﹏﹏﹏﹏﹏﹏﹏﹏﹏﹏﹏



▲ 衛星雲圖


▲ 水汽圖



▲ 熱帶系統分佈

渦度、風切、輻合輻散及駛流圖的圖片因初學者較難理解已收起，以節省空間及減少讀取之數據量，欲查閲者請自行打開


▲ 渦度


▲ 垂直風切變


▲ 高空輻散


▲ 低層輻合







▲ 駛流圖 (請按照熱帶氣旋的氣壓參考)



▲ 浪高／浪向


▲ 海水溫度


▲ 熱帶氣旋會怎麼走？

▲ 香港256／128／64公里雷達



▲ 實時天氣照片



▲ 本港分區氣溫／濕度／能見度




▲ 本港風向及風速／最高陣風／海平面氣壓

GW （gale warning)-由日本氣象廳發出，意思係24小時內會有熱帶風暴形成，即係估計24小時內命名
TCFA (tropical cyclone formation alert)-由JTWC發出，指24小時會有熱帶氣旋（包括熱帶低氣壓）生成，即24小時內正式編號升格
FFS-美國全球預報系統(GFS)的俗稱，諷刺其計算結果如同FF，但近一年預報準確度有所提升
CPA TO HK-該風暴與本港之最接近距離
JTWC BIN C之旅-收集每報JTWC預報報文中的CPA TO HK，事後可以實際CPA TO HK對照作BIN C之用
馮瑞權-澳門氣象局前局長
風水權-馮瑞權俗稱
風水靜，神婆靜，作法靜，巫婆靜-前任澳門氣象局副局長梁嘉靜俗稱，現為首席顧問高級技術員，一度停職4個月。
赤的疑惑-高登氣象台台長
七長官/7長官-製作氣象台警報gif會員
Rose-製作高登風格天氣警告圖的會員，其作品並不授予連登使用
楊振權副庭長-Baroclinic於高登的最新名字
桜の抹茶刺身-連登氣象post負責人1
道地檸檬綠茶-連登氣象post負責人2
雪菜肉絲炆米-連登颱風航空交通post負責人
一個地球人-連登中仔細分析颱風走向及其他高空氣象圖的高質會員
當榴蓮遇上芒果-連登中另一位氣象知識豐富的高質會員
逝去的不回來/夏天冬天夏天-知名氣溫體感假膠，有去埋其他台派膠既attention seeker
李棟旭-連登中製作大量有趣的氣象post相關改圖的會員（包括以上四幅術語圖）
南珠隻狗-連登中氣象知識亦較豐富的會員
伊甸園菜肉餃-伊甸園市長在連登的最新名字
XXXXXX堅豎-土豆在連登的分身
力場J-貼出李首富照片並提醒各巴絲記得準時返工的會員
DH-direct hit 本港一百公里內掠過
中出-風暴中心直接橫過本港
貓5- cat5 五級颱風的英文簡稱
五隻貓-同上，有cat1-5
醉警-酷熱天氣警告誤字
南海之王-氣象迷對香港天文台的尊稱，指其對南海熱帶氣旋預測表現良好，但只限接近廣東沿岸的南海部份，因此又被稱為南海北部之王
STNR-滯留不動
N0.1-向北移0.1度，/E/S/W（東/南/西）同理
8中X-天文台指定8個測風站中有X個達標
login-登陸，源於cctvb錯將″登陸″打成″登錄″
login password-由上引申之術語，意指登陸地
近岸爆發-熱帶氣旋在靠近沿岸時急劇增強，令沿岸地區威脅大增
0號觀望訊號-香港傳媒於熱帶氣旋仍末形成時，已大肆吹奏香港會打風；又或熱帶氣旋已形成，但並非採取接近本港之路徑，傳媒卻仍吹奏有機會打風。此詞用於諷刺傳媒猶如代替天文台發出熱帶氣旋警告訊號
(香港)暴雨走廊-指大嶼山東北起，經荃青葵，擴展至沙田大埔一段，因西南水汽易受此一帶地型抬升影響較易有暴雨。靈感來自美國「龍捲風走廊」。以下為經典例子。


上圖為一分鐘風速標準，轉化至十分鐘標準（hko,jma標準）請乘0.93
chan http://ho.jpg-副檔名可以改為任意三個不同英文字，為伊甸園市長愛用圖片，即下圖

下圖為兩登氣象台提及峴港時愛用cap圖

replies.msg: 點知最終係STY

WDPN31 PGTW 131500
MSGID/GENADMIN/JOINT TYPHOON WRNCEN PEARL HARBOR HI//
SUBJ/PROGNOSTIC REASONING FOR TROPICAL STORM 01W (VONGFONG) WARNING
NR 008//
RMKS/
1. FOR METEOROLOGISTS.
2. 6 HOUR SUMMARY AND ANALYSIS.
TYPHOON (TY) 01W (VONGFONG), LOCATED APPROXIMATELY 428 NM
EAST-SOUTHEAST OF MANILA, PHILIPPINES, HAS TRACKED WEST-NORTHWESTWARD
AT 06 KNOTS OVER THE PAST SIX HOURS. ANIMATED ENHANCED INFRARED (EIR)
SATELLITE IMAGERY OVER THE PAST SIX HOURS DEPICTS A RAPIDLY
INTENSIFYING TYPHOON. DURING THE PREVIOUS 6 HOURS AN EYE OF 12 NM IN
DIAMETER FORMED AND THEN CONTRACTED TO A PINHOLE EYE LESS THAN 5 NM
IN DIAMETER. THE EYE THEN DISAPPEARED BRIEFLY INTO THE CONVECTION
BEFORE REAPPEARING SHORTLY AFTER. EIR IMAGERY FURTHER DEPICTS POCKETS
OF TOWERING, DEEP CONVECTION EMBEDDED IN THE EYE'S PERIPHERY THAT
CONTINUE TO FLARE UP, CYCLE AROUND THE SYSTEM AND DISSIPATE. THE
INITIAL POSITION IS PLACED WITH HIGH CONFIDENCE BASED ON THE WELL
DEFINED PINHOLE EYE FEATURE PRESENT IN THE EIR IMAGERY. THE INITIAL
INTENSITY IS BASED ON A PGTW DVORAK CURRENT INTENSITY ESTIMATE OF
T5.0 (90 KTS) AND A CIMSS ADVANCED DVORAK ADJUSTED INTENSITY ESTIMATE
OF T5.0 (90 KTS). ADDITIONALLY, THE PINHOLE EYE FEATURE, RADIAL
OUTFLOW, INTENSE CONVECTION AND COOLING CLOUD TOPS SIGNAL RAPID
INTENSIFICATION IS TAKING PLACE. THE ENVIRONMENT REMAINS VERY
FAVORABLE FOR ADDITIONAL INTENSIFICATION, WITH LOW (5-10 KTS) VWS,
WARM SSTS (29-30 C) AND ROBUST RADIAL OUTFLOW ALOFT. TY VONGFONG IS
BEING STEERED BY A DEEP-LAYER SUBTROPICAL RIDGE POSITIONED TO THE
EAST NEAR GUAM WHICH IS EXTENDING WEST TOWARD THE LUZON STRAIT.
3. FORECAST REASONING.
A. THERE HAS BEEN NO SIGNIFICANT CHANGE TO THE FORECAST PHILOSOPHY
SINCE THE PREVIOUS FORECAST BULLETIN.
B. TY VONGFONG WILL CONTINUE TO TRACK WEST-NORTHWESTWARD THROUGH
TAU 36 UNDER THE STEERING INFLUENCE OF A BUILDING STR TO THE EAST.
CONDITIONS WILL REMAIN HIGHLY FAVORABLE FOR RAPID INTENSIFICATION
WITH CONTINUED WARM (29-30 C) SSTS, FAVORABLE (10-15 KTS) VWS AND
STRONG DIVERGENT OUTFLOW ALOFT. THESE CONDITIONS WILL ALLOW THE
SYSTEM TO INTENSIFY TO 115 KTS BY TAU 24 BEFORE MAKING LANDFALL OVER
CATANDUANES ISLAND. A SLIGHT WEAKENING OF THE SYSTEM TO 105 KTS BY
TAU 36 WILL OCCUR DUE TO THE FRICTIONAL EFFECTS OF LAND, HOWEVER THIS
WILL BE OFFSET BY CONTINUED FAVORABLE CONDITIONS AND ROBUST OUTFLOW.
AFTER TAU 36, TY VONGFONG WILL HAVE RETURNED OVER WATER AND BEGIN TO
TRACK GENERALLY NORTHWESTWARD AS IT STARTS TO RECURVE AROUND THE
STEERING RIDGE. CONDITIONS WILL REMAIN FAVORABLE TO MAINTAIN AN
INTENSITY OF 105 KTS UNTIL REACHING A SECOND LANDFALL OVER LUZON
SHORTLY AFTER TAU 48. AFTER TAU 48 THE SYSTEM WILL BEGIN A NORTHWARD
TRACK AS IT ROUNDS THE STEERING RIDGE AXIS AND BEGINS TO TRACK OVER
LUZON. AS TY VONGFONG TRAVERSES OVER LAND AND ENTERS THE LUZON STRAIT
IT WILL WEAKEN TO 60 KTS BY TAU 72 DUE TO INTERACTION WITH THE
UNDERLYING TERRAIN. POLEWARD OUTFLOW IS EXPECTED TO REMAIN ROBUST AS
IT BEGINS TO TAP INTO DEEP WESTERLY FLOW ALOFT, PARTIALLY OFFSETTING
THE WEAKENING TREND. INITIALLY, NUMERICAL MODELS ARE IN TIGHT
AGREEMENT THROUGH TAU 24 WITH A SPREAD OF 93 NM. THIS SPREAD
INCREASES TO 428 NM BY TAU 72 WITH GFS, NAVGEM AND JGSM PROVIDING
MODEL SOLUTIONS TO THE EAST OF THE JTWC MULTI-MODEL CONSENSUS AND
UKMET, GALWEM AND ECMWF PROVIDING SOLUTIONS TO THE WEST. THESE LATER
MODELS PROVIDE TRACKS THAT DO NOT ENTER THE LUZON STRAIT AND INSTEAD
BRING THE SYSTEM INTO THE SOUTH CHINA SEA. THE OFFICIAL JTWC FORECAST
TRACK IS HEDGED TO THE EAST OF THE CONSENSUS TRACK, CLOSE TO THE
TIGHT PACKING OF THE EASTERN MODEL SOLUTIONS. THE SPREAD IN MODEL
SOLUTIONS BRINGS THE SYSTEM INTO DIFFERENT SYNOPTIC ENVIRONMENTS AND
THUS LENDS ONLY FAIR CONFIDENCE TO THIS PORTION OF THE JTWC FORECAST
TRACK.
又要留名學野

replies.msg:
特別天氣提示
熱帶氣旋黃蜂會在今日（五月十六日）及明日移向呂宋海峽至台灣以東海域並進一步減弱。預料黃蜂與香港保持一段距離，加上其環流比較細小，對本港沒有直接威脅。但受低壓槽影響，下週華南天氣轉為不穩定，星期一稍後至星期二本港有大驟雨及狂風雷暴，市民請留意天氣變化。
於 2020 年 5 月 16 日 11 時 00 分 發 出
